title: joeperry
author: joeperry
content: Proof of Authentication Format:Quote from: Proof of Authentication TemplateProof of AuthenticationBitcointalk Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link: Utopia Username: Utopia Public Key (Address): ANNOUNCEMENT1. This campaign will now be staked based campaign with a bounty pool of $100 CRP every week and people can only join once.2. Previous participants will be paid with fixed amount but the rounds after that (starting this round) will be staked based.3. We will only have 1 spreadsheet and forms in all of our rounds so it will be centralized data and I will create new thread every round.4. I will lock the form once we have reached the maximum participants every week.5. YOU SHOULD NOW USE YOUR OWN LOCAL LANGUAGE IN PLACING YOUR REVIEW6. If the participants didn't reach 8, we not going to compute based on staked based but rather than a fix paymentNewbie/Jr Member/Copper&Member - $5/eachFull Member/Sr member - $8/eachLegendary/Hero - $12/each
